title: Whatâ€™s the dress code for girls in rr ?
content: Can we wear torn jeans and sleeveless ?

comments.body: Sleeveless clothes are allowed, not sure about torn jeans though. They'll probably let it slide if the torn jeans aren't that noticeable.
Just wear normal jeans if you don't wanna get screwed by the professors.
Wear anything other than shorts or super short skirts/dresses and you're good to go
man i hope sleeveless is allowed
